text: Alà dei Sardi (Alà) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,879 people lived there. Its area is 197.99 km². It is 663 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: Alà dei Sardi
